thread.title: AG race: Democrat incumbent @AGJimHood claims 57-35 lead in poll
thread.title_full: AG race: Democrat incumbent @AGJimHood claims 57-35 lead in poll

author: Frank Corder
title: AG race: Democrat incumbent @AGJimHood claims 57-35 lead in poll
text: Except from Democrat Attorney General Jim Hood's campaign release: POLL SHOWS COMMANDING LEAD BUT FIGHT’S NOT OVER Despite being outspent nearly two to one by my opponent and his out-of-state special interest groups, we maintain a commanding lead in our campaign for Attorney General, according to our most recent poll numbers. Thanks to you, our polling shows that we hold a resounding 57-35 lead with just more than three weeks until election day — the largest gap we’ve achieved at this point in any of our previous campaigns. To date, my campaign has spent $378,362 on media compared to my opponent’s $630,201, which includes money from his out-of-state allies. 10/9/15 Posted October 9, 2015 - 7:26 pm YallPolitics.Com now uses Facebook for comments. Log into Facebook to comment here.
